## Description {#details}

Implementation of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/format-provider">format&#95;provider&lt;T&gt;</a> for c-style strings and string objects such as std::string and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a>.

The options string of a string type has the grammar:

string&#95;options :: &#91;length&#93;

where <code>length</code> is an optional integer specifying the maximum number of characters in the string to print. If <code>length</code> is omitted, the string is printed up to the null terminator.

Definition at line 203 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/formatproviders-h">FormatProviders.h</a>.
